project_overview.summary: Fisheries Hall is a vibrant hub that encapsulates the abundant knowledge of the local fisheries. The hall seeks to inspire visitors by cultivating a heightened awareness of the importance of sustainability in the local fisheries industry through an immersive experience.

featured_image_with_text.content:
The venue is thoughtfully designed to take visitors on a narrative journey, starting from the pier-side and immersing them gradually immersing them into the vast expanse of open waters.

As visitors explore the site, they assume the role of 'rookie' fish students and are led by a knowledgeable teacher fish.

split_screen_gallery_with_caption_1.caption: Layout plan â€” from pier-side to open waters
Ramp connecting the pier and the open waters

featured_text_1.content: We designed a fully immersive setting and narrative to engage the visitors and sparks their curiosity.

subtitle_and_body_1.subtitle: Interactive learning experience
subtitle_and_body_1.body: On a narrative journey, starting from the pier-side and immersing them into open waters. Visitors are immersed in a sea-like environment, where they explore exhibits, learn about marine life, and engage in interactive experiences.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.title: Multimedia exhibits
highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.content: The site offers visitors a diverse range of digital exhibits, each contributing to a comprehensive understanding of the subject matter from various dimensions. One notable highlight is a gamified multi-player fish raft installation, which aims to educate visitors about local fish species.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.title: Process
highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.content: Through thorough research and analysis, we have developed exhibition content that is easily understandable for the general public. In addition to our emphasis on storytelling, we prioritize the site's manageability, ensuring that it can be easily maintained. This empowers administrators to effortlessly update and sustain the site, thereby enhancing the overall user experience and ensuring long-term functionality.
